name: Data Collection Services
description:
In the Distant Future, Corporations have dominated the "Data Recovery Industry" You are a Corporate Drone who controls Corporate branded Drones to travel through desolate buildings to retrieve old files. 
[ Collect 10 White Triangles then Press enter in a Orange Hexagon to Win] 

W-A-S-D to move
Space bar to Quick Teleport
Enter Key to Interact with Doors and Progress the On Screen Text. 

Mouse  Wheel to resize Monitor. 

--- 

Audio - Pixel Noise @PixelNoiseMusic

Everything Else - Storm Hughes (oh please someone help me)
